alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:49AM CDT until August 07 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TIPPAH...NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND SOUTHERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 948 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lagrange, or 17 miles southwest of Bolivar, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Canaan, Pocahontas, Michigan City, Walnut, Middleton, Falkner, Grand Junction, Saulsbury, Rogers Springs, Chalybeate, Brody, New Canaan, Essary Springs, Brownfield, Hamilton, Van Buren and Tiplersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
